function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Economic losses due to limited liquidity, delays in payments, and limited new projects","Impact":"Financial strain on construction companies and potential bankruptcy","Mitigation":"Strengthen financial planning, streamline payment processes, and diversify project portfolio","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, financial forecasting software, and project management tools","People":"Construction companies","Owner":"Financial managers and project managers"},{"Description":"Disruption of construction worker performance due to personnel reduction, hiring of less qualified workers, and limited supervision","Impact":"Decreased productivity, safety risks, and quality issues in construction projects","Mitigation":"Implement safety protocols, provide training for new workers, and increase on-site supervision","Technologies":"Safety monitoring systems, virtual training platforms, and remote supervision tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers","Owner":"Safety supervisors, project managers"},{"Description":"Project stops, delays, and productivity issues","Impact":"Increased project costs, missed deadlines, and reduced profitability","Mitigation":"Improve project scheduling, implement contingency plans, and optimize resource allocation","Technologies":"Project management software, scheduling algorithms, and resource management tools","People":"Project managers, construction workers","Owner":"Project managers, construction company management"}]}
